name: The Mind
description:
The Mind is more than just a game. It's an experiment, a journey, totally simple and the
the greatest team experience ever. If you complete the last level together , you will float on cloud seven. For you must not discuss it, will not exchange any information. And still it works - if you really want ONE you will. Only with the help of your thoughts...

This unique experience can now also be enjoyed as an app!
If you don't have any other players available, you can still experience The Mind by simply playing with one to three of the six individually designed computer players!
Of course, you can also play online with your friends or make new friends playing the game online!
Collect achievements and score top results for particularly successful mastering of the challenge.

Nominated for Game of the Year 2018!
